title: Gallagher, Watermelon-Smashing Comedian, Is Dead at 76
description: He called himself “The Wizard of Odd” for his outrageous stage act, making him one of the most recognizable comedians of the 1980s.
dc:creator: Douglas Martin

media:content.media:description: Gallagher in 1985. He said it was his job to “yell at the world.”
